alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:38AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Jasper and Porter Counties. Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River at Shelby. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, low-lying residences are threatened along Bluegrass Road and in Wildwood Estates east of Sumava Resorts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CST Thursday was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting near 10.9 ft and will begin a slow fall this weekend. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation 48 hours into the future. Changes to the rainfall forecast, or any additional rainfall after 48 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected around 900 PM CST this evening.
